description: This file defines the class 'MarkdownKnowledgeBase' which extends 'AgentKnowledge' and provides methods for loading and iterating over markdown documents from specified paths, including asynchronous variants. It handles reading markdown files, attaching metadata, and validating file paths.

classes.name: MarkdownKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages loading and iterating over markdown documents, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations, with path validation and metadata handling.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Iterates over markdown files in the specified path(s) and yields lists of Document objects.

methods.name: _is_valid_text
methods.description: Checks if a given path points to a valid markdown file based on existence, file type, and suffix.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronously iterates over markdown files in the specified path(s) and yields lists of Document objects.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a single markdown document from a specified path into the vector database, with optional metadata and options for recreating or skipping existing entries.

methods.name: aload_document
methods.description: Asynchronously loads a single markdown document from a specified path into the vector database, with optional metadata and options for recreating or skipping existing entries.
